mapper.select: select "ID", "SID", "DAY", "MODE", "CITY_STATION", "DOMAINID", "DOMAIN", "CONTENT", "ADD_TIME", "UPDATE_TIME", "USER_ID" from ${tableName} where "SID"=#{sId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND "DAY"=#{day,jdbcType=DATE} AND "MODE"=#{mode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND "CITY_STATION"=#{city_station,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND "DOMAINID"=#{domainId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND "DOMAIN"=#{domain,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

select "ID", "SID", "MODE", "CITY_STATION", "DOMAINID", "DOMAIN", "CONTENT", "ADD_TIME", "UPDATE_TIME", "USER_ID" from ${tableName} where "MODE"=#{mode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND "CITY_STATION"=#{city_station,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND "DOMAIN"=#{domain,jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND "DAY"=#{day,jdbcType=DATE}

select "ID", "SID", "MODE", "CITY_STATION", "DOMAINID", "DOMAIN", "CONTENT", "ADD_TIME", "UPDATE_TIME", "USER_ID" from ${tableName} where "SID"=#{sId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND "MODE"=#{mode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND "CITY_STATION"=#{city_station,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND "DOMAINID"=#{domainId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND "DOMAIN"=#{domain,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
